mapper.insert: INSERT INTO staff (st_id, st_name, st_tel, st_email, st_hireDate, st_job) VALUES (#{st_id}, #{st_name}, #{st_tel}, #{st_email}, #{st_hireDate}, #{st_job});
mapper.update: UPDATE staff SET st_id = #{st_id}, st_name = #{st_name}, st_tel = #{st_tel}, st_email = #{st_email}, st_hireDate = #{st_hireDate}, st_job = #{st_job} WHERE st_id = #{st_id};
